Please specify a non-numeric character at the beginning
Allowed characters are alphanumeric and underscore

Write a review on Google Play
Color of negative numbers text in editor
Need to restart app for the change to take effect
Automatically insert space between numbers and operators
Obtain exchange rates from the Internet
Widget stays in the status bar
No applications can perform this action.
License check failed. Please check your network connection status. If you are unable to solve the issue, please contact customer support.
There are no files to be backed up.
The main action must be set for all buttons.
An empty file cannot be saved.
Please allow \"Draw over other apps\" permission.
There are too many files to backup. Please consider using \"CalcNotePlugin for GoogleDrive\".
Thank you very much for using CalcNote. If you like this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? Your review will motivate me to bring more innovative for you.
Are you sure you want to discard the keypad changes?
The file has been modified.\nDo you want to save your changes?
The file has been modified.\nDo you want to save your changes as a draft?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s?
Are you sure you want to delete selected files?
You need to restart app for the change to take effect.
\"High accuracy\" mode allows you to calculate numbers with many digits without error, in exchange for an increase in CPU load. Do you want to proceed?
The synchronization state will be reset. Do you want to proceed?\nThis operation is usually required when the Google Drive account sync destination has changed.
The appearance settings will be reset.\nDo you want to proceed?
CalcNote is developed as a hobby, and motivation can be difficult to maintain. Your excellent review will motivate me to continue to improve the CalcNote. Thank you for your immense support.
Finally, tap the Save button to complete.
The display order can be altered by dragging and dropping list items.
Unnecessary items can be hidden by unchecking their checkbox.
You can create a custom keypad to match your style.
Keypads can be copied, edited, and deleted.
Select the button you want to customize.
Assign an action and subaction to the button.
Set the boundary between number buttons and operator buttons.
You can customize the dialog displayed when tapping the calculation result.
You can reference the calculation result using a variable named \"result\".
For example, if you set the title as \"10% OFF\" and expression as [result - 10%], it can be displayed with a 10% discount rate applied.

Also, you can use a function in a mathematical expression. For example, if you set the title as \"EUR→USD\" and expression as [eur_usd(result)], you can display the converted US dollars value from Euros.
Enter the expression. You can reference the calculation result using a variable named \"result\".
By creating a user-defined action, you can assign arbitrary expressions to button.
For example, if you set the action name as \"Tax\" and value as [+ 6%], it can be displayed the price includes tax.
Enter the action name that displays on the button.
An arbitrary expression can be set for the value.
The created action can be assigned to a button with the setting \"Customize Keypad\".
By creating a user-defined constant, you can define an arbitrary constant like the \"π\" and use it form your expressions.
For example, if you set the constant name as \"e\" and value as [2.718281828459045], you can refer the Napier number from your expressions using \"e\".
A constant name is case sensitive.
An arbitrary number can be set for the value.
The created constant can be assigned to a button with the setting \"Customize Keypad\".
By creating a user-defined function, you can define your calculation logic in Javascript.
The created function can be assigned to a button with the setting \"Customize Keypad\".
Enter a description of the function. This text used in a function help. This field is optional.
Enter a description of the return value. This text used in a function help. This field is optional.
Enter a description of the parameter. This text used in a function help. This field is optional.
Enter an argument value for a test.
Execute the function with the specified parameter. Please confirm that the result is correct.
By saving a regularly-used expression as templates, you can easily create a file based on the template instead of creating a file from scratch.
Existing templates can be edited and deleted.
The created template can be used from the side menu.
Writes an expression in this editing area, the results will automatically be calculated and displayed on the right side. An expression can be revised at any time, like Notepad.
When the result is tapped, the value of binary, hexadecimal, tax included, and tax excluded will be displayed as a popup. Also, you can copy the result to clipboard value by long tapping the result.
You can do calculations over multiple lines, and you can write comments for your expressions.
The expressions are calculated for each line so you can compare the results quickly.
A running total of all your lines is displayed. You can also view the average, tax Included, and tax excluded of all your lines.
You can input the line reference by tapping the line number. For example, If you tap the second line, \"$2\" will be inserted.
Reference variables can be used in your expressions. In this example subtracts the results from line 2 and 3.
If the expressions on the second or third lines are changed, the expressions that use the reference variable are automatically re-calculated.
You can perform subactions assigned to a button by swiping up or down.
You can switch the keypad by swiping left or right. Also, you can customize a keypad layout entirely with the setting \"Customize Keypad\".
You can show the side menu onto the screen by swiping from the left edge of the screen or by tapping the menu icon on the action bar.
Please refer to online help for the detailed usage of the CalcNote.
Move cursor to the beginning of the line
Move cursor to the end of the line
Select from cursor position to the beginning of the line
Select from cursor position to end of the line
Select an available variable from the list and insert
